    • Method Detail

      • idleExecutor

        public RecyclerBinderConfiguration.Builder idleExecutor(LayoutHandlerFactory idleExecutor)
        Parameters:
        idleExecutor - This determines the thread on which the Component layout calculation will be processed in. Null means that the computation will be done in the background thread.

      • invalidStateLogParamsList

        public RecyclerBinderConfiguration.Builder invalidStateLogParamsList(java.util.List<ComponentLogParams> invalidStateLogParamsList)

      • threadPoolConfiguration

        public RecyclerBinderConfiguration.Builder threadPoolConfiguration(LayoutThreadPoolConfiguration threadPoolConfiguration)
        Null value will fall back to the non-null default one.

      • rangeRatio

        public RecyclerBinderConfiguration.Builder rangeRatio(float rangeRatio)
        Parameters:
        rangeRatio - Ratio to determine the number of components before and after the androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView's total number of currently visible items to have their Component layout computed ahead of time.

        e.g total number of visible items = 5 rangeRatio = 10 total number of items before the 1st visible item to be computed = 5 * 10 = 50 total number of items after the last visible item to be computed = 5 * 10 = 50

      • isCircular

        public RecyclerBinderConfiguration.Builder isCircular(boolean isCircular)
        Parameters:
        isCircular - If true, the underlying RecyclerBinder will have a circular behaviour. Note: circular lists DO NOT support any operation that changes the size of items like insert, remove, insert range, remove range

      • wrapContent

        public RecyclerBinderConfiguration.Builder wrapContent(boolean isWrapContent)
        Parameters:
        isWrapContent - If true, the underlying RecyclerBinder will measure the parent height by the height of children if the orientation is vertical, or measure the parent width by the width of children if the orientation is horizontal.

      • hasDynamicItemHeight

        public RecyclerBinderConfiguration.Builder hasDynamicItemHeight(boolean hasDynamicItemHeight)
        TODO T23919104 mihaelao Do not enable this. This is an experimental feature and your Section surface will take a perf hit if you use it. Talk to the Litho team if you think you need this.

      • useBackgroundChangeSets

        public RecyclerBinderConfiguration.Builder useBackgroundChangeSets(boolean useBackgroundChangeSets)
        Experimental. See SectionTree.Target#supportsBackgroundChangeSets() for more info.

        @Deprecated
public RecyclerBinderConfiguration.Builder estimatedViewportCount(int estimatedViewportCount)
        Deprecated. 
        This is a temporary hack that allows a surface to manually provide an estimated range. It will go away so don't depend on it.
